医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
酒精和大麻的联合使用可能会促进成瘾风险许多年轻人喝酒，同时将大麻一起用作应对机制或减轻压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/combind--use-os-of-alcohol-and-cannabis-cannabis-could-fuel-addiction-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/combind--use-os-o---------------------cannabis-cannabis-fuel-addiction-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6939a02-1b4b-4fff-9c1d-43eb1421d27e Thu, 10 Apr 2025 14:04:41 -0400 Combined use of alcohol and cannabis could fuel addiction risks
发现南亚儿童的六个早期生活因素会影响肥胖风险麦克马斯特大学的研究人员在生命的头三年中确定了六个关键因素，这些因素影响了南亚儿童肥胖的轨迹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/six-early-life-factors-found-to-infound-to-influence-influence-obesity-risk-in--in-south-south-asian-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/six-early-life-factors-found-found-to-influence-influence-obesity-risk-in--in-south-south-asian-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14522e96-b1b5-4ccf-88e9-ba1b32a34343b6 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 13:52:08 -0400 Six early life factors found to influence obesity risk in South Asian children
表观遗传发现为减少成瘾复发提供了希望关于成瘾生物学基础的新研究发现，关键的表观遗传酶组蛋白脱乙酰基酶5（HDAC5）限制了基因SCN4B的表达，调节神经元活性，从而形成强药相关的记忆，从而在药物使用障碍（SUDS）中引发强烈的药物相关记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/pegigenetic-discovery-frers-hope-for-for-reducing-addiction-relapse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/epigigenetic-discovery-offers-hope-for-for-reducing-addiction-relapse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eee87928-64EA-482E-B746-3F425390ED95 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 13:38:00 -0400 Epigenetic discovery offers hope for reducing addiction relapse
长期睡眠增强了生活事件的记忆力尽管长期以来已经认识到睡眠对认知的积极影响，但Baycrest的研究人员透露，晚安的睡眠可能会积极增强记忆力，而不是简单地保护其免受衰落的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/sleep-enhances-memory-for-life-events-events-events-event-the-long-ter-term.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/sleep-enhances-memory-for-life-life-events-events-events-event-the-long-ter-term.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87635bb5-c862-474f-9aa0-e48aa987e1b5 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 13:29:57 -0400 Sleep enhances memory for life events over the long term
研究人员发现神经发育障碍的新遗传原因西奈山伊坎医学院研究人员的开创性研究及其在英国，比利时，西班牙，荷兰和冰岛的合作者发现了神经发育障碍（NDDS）的新遗传原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/researchers-uncover-a-new-genetic-cause-cause-of-neuroveloverment-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/researchers-uncover-a-new-genetic-genetic-cause-cause-of-neuroveloverment-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e10ccb4e-a5f0-4af0-4af0-8e27-802a262359c8 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 13:15:26 -0400 Researchers uncover a new genetic cause of neurodevelopmental disorders
吸烟的地方对处境不利的家庭有压力昆士兰州大学研究发现，处境不利的家庭的吸烟率更高，给家庭预算施加压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/smoking-places-financial-strain-strain-on-on-disadvantaged-households.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/smoking-places-financial-strain-strain-on-on-disadvantaged-househouseholds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f3fa61b-26df-4D08-80C2-EB67190413D3 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 12:58:52 -0400 Smoking places financial strain on disadvantaged households
创新研究为有脑创伤的退伍军人提供了希望脑外伤（TBI）是一个严重的问题，每年影响美国成千上万的人。对于兵役人员而言，影响更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/innovative-research-fters-hope-for-veter-for-veterans-with-brain-trauma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/innovative-research-fters-hope-for-veterans-with-brain-trauma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa3A4977-71A4-4459-944C-D65ECCE7D01B Thu, 10 Apr 2025 12:40:55 -0400 Innovative research offers hope for veterans with brain trauma
眼睛跟踪揭示了多重残疾个体的未开发潜力使用眼球追踪 - 一种用于录制和分析眼动的技术 - 来自日内瓦大学（Unige）的团队表明，有多重残疾的人可以提高其社交和情感技能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/eye-tracking-reveals-untapped-potential-in-individuals-with-multiple-disabilities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/eye-tracking-reveals-untapped-potential-in-individuals-with-multiple-disabilities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c18043c4-5ad9-4696-b457-62c176b78e76 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 12:28:07 -0400 Eye tracking reveals untapped potential in individuals with multiple disabilities
新的抗生素化合物在与MRSA的战斗中成为有力的候选人用于治疗超级细菌和其他细菌感染的新抗生素的开发是全球的重中之重，当前的抗生素无法治疗的感染速率上升，并呈现了对人类健康最大的威胁之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-antibiotic-compound-emerges-emerges-as-as-astrong-candidate-in-the-the-the-the-fight-against-mrsa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-antibiotic-compound-emerges-emerges-as-as-astrong-candidate-in-the-the-the-fight-against-mrsa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6519711-6002-44fe-a53d-f619c2394e37 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 12:14:40 -0400 New antibiotic compound emerges as strong candidate in the fight against MRSA
USC研究人员揭示了中风后尿失禁背后的大脑活动一项使用功能磁共振成像（fMRI）的新的USC领导的研究揭示了导致尿失禁的神经机制，这是一种影响中风幸存者的常见状况，对其生活质量产生了重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/usc-researchers-reveal-brain-brain-activity-behind-post-post-stroke-stroke-rinary-rinary-incontinence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/usc-researchers-reveal-reveal-brain-activity-behind-behind-post-post-stroke-stroke-stroke-urinary-incontinence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f8DC58C-5514-41BB-90FA-5577F713C7BC Thu, 10 Apr 2025 08:24:34 -0400 USC researchers reveal brain activity behind post stroke urinary incontinence
